properties.description: Stg file list tablosuna containerdaki dosyalarÄ± insert eden pipeline

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	itemname as string (toString('CRFR_20210321.csv'))
}
source(output(
		dummy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 1 as dummy',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> dummy
dummy derive(itemname = replace(replace($itemname, '.xlsx', ''),'.csv','')) ~> itemname
itemname sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		DS_FILENAME = itemname
	)) ~> stgfilelist
